docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's favorite TV network is increasingly serving as a West Wing casting call, as the president reshapes his administration with camera-ready personalities.
The president’s latest made-up statement renewed the question: When does he know the things he says are false and when is he simply misinformed?

headline.print_headline: When Fiction  Is a Fact of Life
headline.main: Trump and the Truth: A President Tests His Own Credibility

docs.snippet: There are far too few psychiatric beds in the United States, researchers say. But debate rages over what to do with those who require long-term care.

headline.main: Trump Wants More Asylums — and Some Psychiatrists Agree

docs.snippet: Also: West Virginia’s strike and Paul Ryan’s urgings
Melania Trump has long said she wants to curb online bullying. Her efforts often clash with the president's habit of using Twitter to insult people.

headline.print_headline: First Lady Is Fighting Online Bullies; Her Husband Is a Repeat Offender
headline.main: Melania Trump Wants to End Online Bullying. Her Husband Doesn’t Help.

docs.snippet: “Trump brags about firing people the same way a toddler brags about using the bathroom alone for the first time,” Fallon said.

headline.print_headline: Jimmy Fallon Roasts Trump for Bragging That He Fired Tillerson ‘by Myself’
headline.main: Jimmy Fallon Roasts Trump for Bragging That He Fired Tillerson ‘by Myself’

docs.snippet: The president tweeted on Monday that tariffs of steel and aluminum could be removed from Canada and Mexico if a fair Nafta is signed, while Paul D. Ryan bashed the tariffs.

headline.main: Ryan Criticizes Tariff Plan as Trump Issues Nafta Threat

docs.snippet: The expulsion order included 12 people identified as Russian intelligence officers stationed at the United Nations. The Russian consulate in Seattle also must close.

headline.main: Trump and Western Allies Expel Scores of Russians in Sweeping Rebuke Over U.K. Poisoning

docs.snippet: The directive essentially bans service members from identifying as transgender, but it also largely gives the Pentagon the ability to make exceptions.

headline.print_headline: New Policy Lets Transgender Troops Stay in Service, but With Restrictions
headline.main: Trump Approves New Limits on Transgender Troops in the Military

docs.snippet: A lawsuit by the pornographic-film actress claims that Mr. Trump purposely did not sign the agreement so he could later disavow any knowledge of it, if necessary.

headline.main: Stormy Daniels Sues, Saying Trump Never Signed ‘Hush Agreement’
